content: I am a final year undergraduate student in Turing Class, Peking University, advised by Prof. Yingfei Xiong. I also worked with Prof. Hongfei Fu and Prof. Bingkai Lin this summer. I am interested in problems about programs and programming languages, especially in program synthesis, decision procedures and probabilistic program verification.

title: Yican Sun
Quantitative Analysis of Assertion Violations in Probabilistic Programs
Concentration-Bound Analysis for Probabilistic Programs and Probabilistic Recurrence Relations
Guiding Dynamic Programing via Structural Probability for Accelerating Programming by Example.
